import { BrowserRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Routes } from "react-router-dom" import { Route } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Services } from "../Container/services/Services" import { Home } from "../Container/home/Home" import { Galery } from "../Container/galery/Galery" import { Aboutus } from "../Container/aboutus/Aboutus" import { Contacts } from "../Container/contacts/Contacts" import '../app.css' import {useState} from "react"; const Router = () => { const [openMenu,setOpenMenu]=useState(window.innerWidth>991 ? true :false) return ( <>
